fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - You may use the first ability of your role on another player (you do not know if you have a unique targetting ability). You are told any info from it. You are told if you lost a charge from it.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- When this role is rolled, reroll and apply everything listed below.
- At the beginning of the game, the player is told they forgot who they are. They are not told anything about their role.
- The player may only use the ability listed above until they remember new abilities.
- If the player is in a Factional Chat, they are not added to it but the faction is informed of who they are.
- On even nights, the player may choose to remember a random Ability, random Attribute, Goal, or Attack and Defense.
- If the player adds a status effect to players, they will not see if any players have said status effect unless a revealed ability or attribute reveals the existance of the status effect.
- Once the player remembers everything about them, they learn their post number and role name, as well as being added to a Factional Chat if they are in one.
